summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1748, for the improvement of Seventh Avenue, from Pike Street to Westlake Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 18549 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
